items.sentence: A green carpet won't go well with these blue curtains.
If you don't miss the train, you'll get there on time.
I hope that your parents will allow us to get married.
Tom was caught making a U-turn when he shouldn't have.
Tom found a suitcase full of money behind the library.
All of the money I had in this drawer has been stolen.
No matter what happens, my determination won't change.
She's in high school, but her boyfriend is in college.
She's been severely traumatized by bullying at school.
Tom doesn't like it when he doesn't have enough money.
